articles.content: In an exclusive, Reuters reports that Siemens Gamesa and Siemens Energy will develop commercial offshore wind turbines that can produce hydrogen via electrolysis. “It is the renewable industrys most … [+2098 chars]

articles.title: Maskless shopper attacks shop assistant after she asked him to wear Covid face covering inside store - The Scottish Sun
articles.content:
